metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28963 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Shibboleth Service Provider before 3.2.1 allows content injection becausetemplate generation uses attacker-controlled parameters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28963` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-shib - 3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
libapache2-mod-shib2 - 3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
libshibsp-plugins - 3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
libshibsp8 - 3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
shibboleth-sp-common - 3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
shibboleth-sp-utils - 3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
shibboleth-sp2-common - 3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
shibboleth-sp2-utils - 3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shibboleth-sp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1').
